comment._content: This image has been used in the indicommons.org post Tennessee v. John T. Scopes.

comment.author: 37996646559@N01
comment._content:
The day after Bryan’s death following the Scopes trial in
1925, H. L. Mencken scarcely took the time to bow his
head before uncharitably calling him “a charlatan, a
mountebank, a zany without sense or dignity….leading
his forlorn mob of imbeciles…[and] uttering stuff that
a boy of eight would laugh at.”
